comment._content: I started an entry in Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mary_Stewart_Cutting

comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: Her IMDb entry (she wrote scenarios for a couple short silent films in 1916): www.imdb.com/name/nm1945253/ Her story "The Blossoming Rod" as an ebook: www.gutenberg.org/ebooks/14946 She also contributed a chapter titled "The Daughter-in-Law" to a collaborative novel, The Whole Family in 1916; other contributors included William Dean Howells, Elizabeth Stuart Phelps, Mary E. Wilkins Freeman... The Librivox recording of that novel is here: librivox.org/the-whole-family-by-various/

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: onlinebooks.library.upenn.edu/webbin/book/lookupname?key=... supplies links to page images of several of her books.
